p: The hypoglycemic effect of the extracts and four of the isolated compounds ( 4– 7, Table 2) were evaluated using α-glucosidase from Saccharomyces cerevisiae (G5003, Sigma, St. Luis., MO, USA). On one hand, the hexane and methanolic extracts exhibited a weak inhibitory effect while the ethyl acetate extract showed a strong inhibitory effect. On the other hand, only ursolic acid demonstrated to be the most promising compound with an IC 50 below than 100 µM. Uvaol, salvigenin and squalene showed inhibitory effect at concentrations higher than 500 µM having a poor or no effect over the enzyme ( Table 2).
